article: A beautiful girl was shopping with her mother in Blue-sky Market. It was _ hard outside. Many people all stood there under the awning . They waited, some patiently, others impatiently because of the bad weather. The girl's _ was so sweet. "Mom, let's run through the rain," she said suddenly. "What?" Mom asked. "Let's run through the rain!" "No, Honey. We'll _ until it slows down a bit," Mom replied. The child waited about another _ and repeated, "Mom, let's run through the rain." "We'll get _ if we do," Mom said. "No, we won't, Mom. That's not what you said this _ " the young girl said as she tugged at her mom's arm. "This morning? _ did I say we could run through the rain and not get wet?" "Don't you _ ? When you were talking to Daddy _ his cancer, you said, 'If God can get us through this, he can get us through _ !'" The people became _ . Nothing could be _ but the rain. Mom thought for a moment about what she would say. "Honey, you are _ Let's run through the rain." _ they ran off. People all stood watching, smiling and laughing as they _ past the cars and through the puddles . They _ their shopping bags over their heads. They got wet through, but they were _ by a few who laughed like children all the _ to their cars. People can take off your money and health, but no one can ever take away your memories. So, don't _ to make time to make memories every day.
